quiz.text: As per the paragraph, Tele-MANAS helpline was launched in October _________.
options: 2022
2020
2017
2021
2019

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to TELE-MANAS? A. Implementation agency is NIMHANS, Bengaluru. B. Technology support is provided by IIIT Bengaluru. C. It is being implemented in 2 tiers, with Tier 1 consisting of specialists at District Mental Health Programme.
options: A and B
B and C
A only
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Recently (April 2023), the Union Ministry of Housing & Urban Affairs has launched the ‘City Beauty Competition’. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the ‘City Beauty Competition?

A.      Administrative Staff College of India (ASCI) is the knowledge partner.

B.      Wards and Public spaces in cities would be judged against seven broad pillars.

C.      Aesthetics and Affordability are two of the broad pillars for judging the wards and public spaces.
options: A and C
B and C
C only
A and B
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to PM Urja Ganga Project?

A.      It is being implemented by ONGC.

B.      Chhattisgarh is one of the 5 states being covered through the project.

C.      Length of the pipeline is 3400 KM.
options: A and B
B and C
C only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Nasha Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan was launched in 2020 in 272 vulnerable districts. What is/are the basis for district identification for NMBA?

A.      Findings from the comprehensive National survey.

B.      Inputs by Narcotics Control Bureau.

C.      Inputs from SECC 2011.
options: A and B
A only
B only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the Unified Logistics Interface Platform (ULIP)?

A.      ULIP is a platform that aims to create a monopoly and un-levelled advantage in the logistics industry.

B.      ULIP has not been integrated with any digital systems of the Ministry of Coal yet.

C.      ULIP has a dedicated portal named Goulip.in for accessing data.
options: A and B
B and C
C only
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), the 6th Edition of ‘Advantage Healthcare India 2023’ has been held at New Delhi. It has been organized by Ministry of Health & Family Welfare in association with which of the following organizations?
options: CII
FICCI
NITI Aayog
WHO
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), the Government of India & the Government of Gujarat have organized the Saurashtra Tamil Sangamam. Which of the following program was the Saurashtra Tamil Sangamam launched under?
options: Make in India
Swachh Bharat Abhiyan
Ek Bharat Shreshtha Bharat
Digital India program
Skill India program

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), under which of the following presidencies has the Youth20 (Y20) Pre-Summit hosted by the Ministry of Youth and Sports Affairs?
options: India's BRICS Presidency
India's SCO Presidency
India's G20 Presidency
India's ASEAN Presidency
India's SAARC Presidency

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), Solar Energy Corporation of India Limited (SECI) has shared data regarding the increase in trade in renewable energy during FY2022-23. The revenue from power trading has crossed __________ mark for the first time since its inception.
options: Rs. 1,000 Crore
Rs. 1,00,000 Crore
Rs. 10,000 Crore
Rs. 50,000 Crore
Rs. 25,000 Crore

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the Open Network for Digital Commerce?

A.      It is an initiative of Reserve Bank of India.

B.      It is a section 12 company under Companies Act, 2013.

C.      Its objective is democratization and decentralization of e-commerce.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Which of the following feature is/are correct and has/have been added to the eShram Portal?

A.      A feature of capturing family details of migrant worker.

B.      Feature on sharing of data of construction workers with the concerned Building and Other Construction Workers’ (BOCW) Welfare Board.

C.      A feature of capturing medical record of the migrant worker.
options: B and C
A only
B only
None of the above
A and B

quiz.text:
E-Shram portal aims to create a database of which of the following categories of workers?

A.      Construction Workers

B.      Migrant Workers

C.      Gig and Platform Workers

D.     Domestic Workers
options: A and B
B and C
A, B and C
C and D
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently, the Prime Minister has launched the Inclusive Development (Samaveshi Vikaas) campaign on 24th April 2023. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the campaign?
options: 9 campaigns under the Azadi Ka Amrit Mahotsav-Inclusive Development (Samaveshi Vikaas) theme have been launched.
5 campaigns are under Ministry of Rural Development.
SVAMITVA, Meri Sampatti, Mera Haq campaign is being run by Ministry of Panchayati Raj.
Natural Farming with SHG Women campaign is being co-run by Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers' Welfare and Ministry of Rural Development.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), the Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi has addressed a programme marking 20 years of completion of the StateWide Attention on Grievances by Application of Technology (SWAGAT) Initiative. The SWAGAT initiative in ________ demonstrates how technology can be efficiently used to resolve people's grievances
options: Tamil Nadu
Assam
Madhya Pradesh
Gujarat
Himachal Pradesh

quiz.text:
According to the recent (April 2023) data shared, 28 States/UTs have adopted the National Generic Document Registration System (NGDRS) for Land Records. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to NGDRS?

A.      It is an initiative of Department of Rural Development.

B.      It fulfills the objective of One Nation One Software for Land Records.

C.      It facilitates states to create state specific instances and configure the software as per requirement.
options: A and C
B and C
A and B
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding the Asia Pacific Leaders' Conclave on Malaria Elimination, recently (April 2023) organized by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare?

A.      The conclave was held in New Delhi.

B.      The conclave was organized by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare in partnership with the World Health Organization.

C.      The aim of the conclave was to reaffirm political commitment to galvanize action for malaria elimination by 2025.

D.     The conclave was presided by Dr V.K. Paul, Member (Health), NITI Aayog.
options: A and D
A, B and C
A, C and D
C only
A, B, C and D

quiz.text:
What has/have been the main announcement(s) made during the recently (April 2023) held India-UK Science and Innovation Council meeting?

A.      Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) for collaboration on Space Programme.

B.      Establishment of a new UK-India Net Zero Innovation Virtual Centre.

C.      Launch of a joint project for the development of blue hydrogen as a renewable source.
options: A and C
B and C
A and B
B only
C only

quiz.text: Which of the following organizations/Ministries has been the Investment Promotion and Facilitation partner for the recently (April 2023) held 1st Global Tourism Investors’ Summit, organized by Ministry of Tourism, Government of India?
options: Confederation of Indian Industry
Ministry of Culture
German National Tourist Board
World Bank
Invest India

quiz.text: What has been announced by the College Management of Imperial College London during Indian Union Minister's recent (April 2023) visit, in relation to Indian students studying in the college?
options: They will provide free accommodation to all Indian students.
They will provide scholarships worth £ 400,000 to all Indian students.
They will provide job opportunities to all Indian students after graduation.
They will provide free medical insurance to all Indian students.
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following is a concept floated by Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi during the SCO summit in Qingdao, China in 2018?
options: WIN-WIN Paradigm
Uniting the People
Environmental protection
Humanitarian Assistance and Disaster Relief (HADR)
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), Union Ministry of Tourism in association with Department of Tourism, Government of Rajasthan has organized G20 Tourism Expo in Jaipur, Rajasthan. As per the information shared at the expo, Government of India has planned to develop _________ new tourist destinations across India with a focus on green tourism.
options: 75
100
50
200
125

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), which of the following concept(s) has been supported by all member states during the 10th Meeting for the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) Transport Ministers chaired by the Union Minister for Road Transport and Highways?
options: Concept of cooperation to achieve greater efficiency in transport sector
Concept of promoting digital transformation in transportation
Concept of decarbonizing transport
Concept of promoting innovative technologies for transportation
All of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Gem & Jewellery Export Promotion Council (GJEPC)?

A.      Set up by the Ministry of Finance, in 1966.

B.      Granted autonomous status in 1998.

C.      It is headquartered in Surat, Gujarat.
options: A and B
A only
B only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ‘Mann Ki Baat’?

A.      First episode was aired on 3rd October, 2014.

B.      It is broadcasted on last Sunday of every month at 11 am.

C.      Each episode is broadcasted for 1 hour.
options: A only
A and B
B and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Recently (April 2023), the Union Ministry of Information and Broadcasting has organized the National Conclave on Mann Ki Baat @100 at New Delhi. Which of the following was/were the thematic session(s) at the conclave?

A.      Nari Shakti

B.      Virasat Ka Uthan

C.      Atmanirbhar Bharat

D.     Ahwan Se Jan Andolan
options: A and B
A and C
A, B and D
B, C and D
A, B, C and D

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the National Medical Device Policy, 2023? A.   Policy is expected to help the Medical Devices Sector, grow from present $11 Billion to $50 Billion by 2030. B.   Achieving 20-25% share in the expanding global market over the next 25 years. C.   The policy framework has been developed by the Department of Biotechnology.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the India’s 1st Water Bodies Census?
options: It is a comprehensive inventory of only natural water bodies.
Out of total water bodies 97.1 per cent are in rural areas and only 2.9 per cent are in urban areas.
West Bengal has highest number of ponds and reservoirs.
Tamil Nadu has highest number of lakes.
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following water bodies type constitute the highest percentage (in terms of numbers)?
options: Tanks
Ponds
Reservoirs
Lakes
Check Dams

quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), India along with ________ and ________ held the first trilateral political consultation between the foreign affairs ministries in Yerevan. Focus areas was connectivity, especially the International North-South Transport Corridor (INSTC).
options: Russia; Iran
Russia, Turkey
Iran; Armenia
Iran; Azerbaijan
Russia; Armenia
